item.title: Vi Everything
item.description: Here’s the list of couple places that I enable vi mode. Bash shell set -o vi I always enable bash movement mode in my .bashrc file. With it set, I can switch between normal mode and edit mode by pressing ESC. Editing works as any normal shell, but when switching to normal mode, I can use vi movement keys like j, k, h, l, w, b, e, $, ^, editing current line is also faster by using selectors such as cw, dw, C, D.
